title: Authors and Citation
text: Ejstrud J, Lars Pedersen (2024). pxmake: Create px files. R package version 0.11.0.9007, https://statisticsgreenland.github.io/pxmake/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {pxmake: Create px files},   author = {Johan Ejstrud and {Lars Pedersen}},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 0.11.0.9007},   url = {https://statisticsgreenland.github.io/pxmake/}, }

title: Create px files
text: pxmake R package creating modifying px files. pxmake can: Import PC-AXIS px file, modify , save new px file. Save px file Excel workbook. complex modifications px file, like adding total levels variable.

title: Create px files
text: Install latest version running: pxmake available CRAN.

title: Create px files
text: Use px() px_save() read/write px file px object. modify px object, use pxmake’s modifying functions. general, modifying functions named keyword modify. ’s possible chain multiple modifying functions together tidyverse style using pipe operator %>%.
code: library(pxmake)  # Read px file into a px object x <- px(input = "example.px")  class(x) #> [1] "px"  # Save px object as a new px file px_save(x, path = "example2.px") library(magrittr) # import pipe  # Create px object from data frame x <- px(data.frame(year = as.character(rep(2021:2023, each = 3)),                     group = c('a', 'b', 'c'),                     value = runif(9)                    )         )   head(x$data, 4) #> # A tibble: 4 × 3 #>   year  group value #>   <chr> <chr> <dbl> #> 1 2021  a     0.266 #> 2 2021  b     0.372 #> 3 2021  c     0.573 #> 4 2022  a     0.908  x %>%    px_timeval("year") %>%  # Set year as TIMEVAL   px_heading("year") %>%  # Set year as HEADING   px_stub("group") %>%    # Set group as STUB   px_decimals("2") %>%    # Set DECIMALS to 2   px_save("example.px") # Save as px file

title: Create px files
text: Currently following 46 keywords modifying function pxmake: addition , following 3 modifying functions available: See help page modifying function information. 38 keywords currently doesn’t modifying function, can implemented. Finally 2 keywords modifying function, automatically determined data.

what: How to create a new release
title: Create px files
text: Checkout ‘main’ branch. Run usethis::use_version('major'/'minor'/'patch'). Answer ‘’ prompt ‘ok commit ?’. Update NEWS.md changes since last release. Commit changes message ‘Increment version number X.Y.Z’. Run git tag vX.Y.Z. Run git push. Run git push --tags. Run devtools::use_github_release(). Review relase description. sattified, click ‘edit’ pen upper right corner. Click ‘Publish release’. Run usethis::use_version('dev'). Answer ‘Yes’ prompt ‘ok commit ?’. Run git push.

text: languages data frame language metadata. table1 data frame language independent table metadata. table2 data frame language dependent table metadata. variables1 data frame language independent variable metadata. variables2 data frame language dependent variable metadata. cells1 data frame language independent cells metadata. cells2 data frame language dependent cells metadata. acrosscells data frame metadata spans multiple cells. data data frame data.

title: Create micro px files — px_micro
text: Split one px object many small px files (micro files), count variables .

title: Create micro px files — px_micro
text: x px object. out_dir Directory save px files . keyword_values Optional. data frame column 'variable' one : 'px_contents', 'px_title', 'px_description', 'px_matrix'. columns added keywords table non-HEADING variable match 'variable' column. probably work keywords well. Use column 'filename' control filename micro file. filename path relative 'out_dir'. Currently support multiple languages.

title: Create micro px files — px_micro
text: HEADING variables use micro files, file created non-HEADING variable. new px files saved directory specified out_dir. main loop uses furrr package parallelisation. Use future::plan() choose parallelise.

title: pxmake (development version)
text: Add modifying functions: px_values(), px_variable_label(). Add pkgdown version documentation : https://statisticsgreenland.github.io/pxmake/

title: pxmake (development version)
text: Update px_micro() documentation. Bugfix: px_add_totals() now uses default value ‘Total’ x$variables2$elimination NA. (#284) Add na.rm argument px_add_totalts(). Improve pkdown site.

title: pxmake 0.11.0
text: release contains lot breaking changes. done functions name clashes popular packages. prefix ‘px_’ added almost functions avoid . massive breaking change, breaking changes made well, create intuitive naming make package consistent.

what: How to update code from before version 0.11.0
title: pxmake 0.11.0
text: Change modifying functions adding prefix px_. E.g. change stub() px_stub(), heading() px_heading(), etc. Change pxsave() px_save(). Change micromake() px_micro(). functions deprecated can longer used: metamake(), pxmake(), make_template(). Change x$codelists1 x$codelists2 x$cells1 x$cells2. Change x$acrosscell x$acrosscells. Change x$variables1$type x$variables1$variable-type. Change sheet ‘Codelists1’ ‘Codelists2’ ‘Cells1’ ‘Cells2’. Change sheet ‘Acrosscell’ ‘Acrosscells’. ‘Variables1’ sheet change column ‘type’ ‘variable-type’ . set variable TIMEVAL add new column ‘timeval’ ‘Variables1’ set ‘TRUE’. TIMEVAL can longer set type="TIME" Variables1.

title: pxmake 0.11.0
text: Rename ‘codelists’ ‘cells’ px-object Excel workbooks. (#256) Deprecate ‘metamake’, ‘pxmake’ ‘make_template’. (#198) Change name modifying functions adding prefix ‘px_’. (#254) Rename ‘acrosscell’ ‘acrosscells’. (#271) Rename type variable-type variables1. (#261) Move TIMEVAL column variables1, instead part variable-type. (#265) Rename ‘pxsave’ ‘px_save’. (#273) Rename ‘figures’ ‘px_figures’, ‘order’ ‘px_order’, ‘add_totals’ ‘px_add_totals’. (#274) Rename ‘micromake’ ‘px_mircro’.

title: pxmake 0.11.0
text: Add modifying functions: map(), baseperiod(), domain(), elimination(), descriptiondefault(), order(), precision(), cellnote(), cellnotex(), cfprices(), stockfa(), variable_type(), contvariable(). (#246) (#125) (#223) micromake() use furrr package run parallel. (#248) micromake() removes headings figures NA. (#250)

title: pxmake 0.11.0
text: Fix mistake documentation table2 modifying functions. Avoid warning caused helper function. Bugfix: cellnote() can handle empty data frame.

title: pxmake 0.10.1
text: Change modifying functions also getters, e.g. stub(x) returns current STUB variables. pxsave() automatically adds values aren’t defined codelists2. Add argument save_data pxsave() supress saving ‘Data’ sheet Excel. (#204) Add arugment data_path pxsave() save data table .rds file. (#204) Add micromake arguments control keywords invidual tables. (#239) Add possibility micromake control output filenames. (#242) Add new modifying functions: last_updated(), next_update(), language(), languages(), valuenote(), valuenotex(), contents(), description(), subject_area(), subject_code(), title(), units(), aggregallowed(), autopen(), axis_version(), codepage(), confidential(), copyright(), showdecimals(), tableid(), update-frequency(), contact(), link(), note(), notex(), infofile().

title: pxmake 0.10.1
text: Throw error trying remove mandatory keyword. (#208) Validate px using modifying functions. validate_px checks keywords table1 table2 right table. Check arguments micromake valid. Sort data creating codelist data frame. (#197) Add priority complexity list unimplemented keywords. Add check keywords correct table. Remove ‘micro’ prefix filenames created micromake(). Use documentation functions table1 table2 functions, easy change. Add test coverage badge README.md. Check defined variable-codes data. Add check data columns defined. micromake() used preserve HEADING variables, produces px files variables. Bugfix: heading(), stub() figures() longer modify order variables. (#225) Remove duplication documentaiton pivot modifying functions. Bugfix: last_updated() created wrong keyword (#233) Remove ‘micro’ prefix filenames created micromake(). Bugfix: wrong error message (#243) Bugfix: last_updated() modified wrong table. Bugfix: Remove NA values creating px file (#205). Bugfix: px(input) can path .rds file.

title: pxmake 0.10.0
text: function px() creates px object. major change way package works. pxmake metamake soft deprecated. Use px() pxsave() instead. (#197) modify px object, number modifying functions added: charset(), creation_date(), decimals(), matrix(), stub(), heading(), timeval(), add_totals() figures(). Many need added future, cover px keywords.

title: pxmake 0.10.0
text: ‘rds’ version px file completly gone. Neither pxmake() metamake() can create . pxmake() metamake() can convert Excel px files, return px object invisibly. pxmake() metamake() deprecated future. make_template() deprecated future - px() automatically creates metadata template none provided. micromake() now takes px object input. add_totals() now takes px object input.

title: pxmake 0.10.0
text: README.md rewritten, includes list keywords modifying functions. vignettes removed. README.md now created README.Rmd using knitr::knit().

title: pxmake 0.9.1
text: Add make_template create minimial multilingual metadata template. (#186) Add micromake create many small px-files large data set. See vignette(micromake). (#176) Support keyword VALUENOTE (#187)

title: pxmake 0.9.1
text: Add import pipe. (Reverses commit #d59866c) Add vignette creating px file multilingual px file. Fix edge case list mergeing. Use latin1 default encoding, add CODEPAGE=utf-8. Set maximum column width Excel. Add create_data argument metamake can supress generation data.

title: pxmake 0.9.0
text: Let metamake accept data frame input create minimal metadata template data.

title: pxmake 0.9.0
text: Handle px-files either zero heading variables zero stub variables. (#95) Fix edge case list sorting caused px-files codes. Use values codes code given add_totals variable.

title: pxmake 0.8.1
text: Use variable-code variable-label label given. (#173) Quote values text keywords even text number. (#164)

title: pxmake 0.8.0
text: Split sheet ‘Table’ two sheets language dependency. (#65) Split column ‘position’ ‘Variables’ sheet ‘pivot’ ‘order’. (#159) Check illegal values columns ‘pivot’ ‘type’ ’Variables sheet. Rename ‘variable’ ‘long_name’ ‘variable-code’ ‘variable-label’. (#144) Add check language-dependent mandatory variables Excel metadata.

title: pxmake 0.8.0
text: Return rds object invisibly pxmake metamake. (#37) Support CONTVARIABLE. (#132) Preserve name FIGURES variable data formats.

title: pxmake 0.8.0
text: Rename internal functions ‘source_data’ ‘data’. (#151) Print error message without name function threw error. Sort metadata saving.

title: pxmake 0.7.0
text: Make pxmake metamake read write .rds files.

title: pxmake 0.7.0
text: Validate arguments pxmake metamake give helpful error messages. Support px-files without LANGUAGES keyword. (#143) Remove dependencies test run parallel. (#112) Split tests files run faster parallel. (#149) GitHub actions cancels build newer commit pushed. Lots documentation improvements.

title: pxmake 0.5.2
text: Remove need awkward quoting metadata multiple languages. Previously written en","da","kl, can now en,da,kl. Remove VARIABLECODE figures variables. Make metamake use value code code missing. Ignore NAs summing add_totals.

title: pxmake 0.5.1
text: Add keyword VARIABLECODE variable names source data.

title: pxmake 0.5.1
text: Remove quotes around YES elimination. Make Excel table theme less dominant. Allow variable names contain characters except quotes (“). Improve installation instructions.

title: pxmake 0.5.0
text: Rename ‘General’ metadata sheet ‘Table’. (#85) Rename argument pxmake(source_data_path) source_data (#71) Rename argument metamake(out_path) xlsx_path. (#106)

title: pxmake 0.5.0
text: Write read files encoding defined keyword CODEPAGE. (#114, #115) Break lines px-files values longer 256 characters. (#113) Support main languages English. (#54) Support language code (previously supported: en, da, kl, fo). (#117)

title: pxmake 0.5.0
text: Add formatting Excel metadata workbook created metamake(). (#100) Add argument rds_data_path metamake() save data rds file. (#108) Let pxmake() accept data frame source data addition accepting path. (#71) Turn readLines() warning missing EOL character. (#113) Rename .figures figures_ metadata created metamake(). (#104) Allow forward slashes variables names. Let metamake() support tables without time variables. (#120) Use values codes codes metadata. (#102)

title: pxmake 0.4.0
text: Add metamake() creates Excel metadata workbook px-file. inverse function pxmake(). (#68)

title: pxmake 0.4.0
text: CODES added time variables. (#91) Data cube sorted correctly data one heading variable. (#93) Non-figure variables read character. (#87, #84, #73) Add keywords AUTOPEN AGGREGALLOWED Allow figures variable name (previously ‘values’)

title: pxmake 0.3.0
text: Time values added correctly px file. source_data_path given, pxmake() looks ‘Data’ sheet metadata uses instead. New argument: add_totals. Choose variable(s) add total level .

title: pxmake 0.3.0
text: Complete data using values codelist data. Lot small changes avoid warnings running R CMD check. Add automatic testing GitHub. Move helper functions file.

title: pxmake 0.2.0
text: Better names sheets, variables keywords Excel metadata workbook. Sort keywords recommended order

title: pxmake 0.1.0
text: Allow blank fields metadata (NA replaced ““) PxJob run parts tests
